Category

A panel with the category name at the top and the items in the category listed vertically.

Functions
constructor
constructor(
props
)
Parameters
props

Object with the properties category, the category ID number; cart, an array of oject with at least menu_item_info_id and name properties; and setCart, a function that changes cart

componentDidMount
componentDidMount()

Executes when the Category component is first put in place, gets the items in the category and the category's name.

render
render()

Generates category panel.

Returns

<div> tag containing panel

imageUrl
function imageUrl(
item
)

Generates URL to item image.

Parameters
item

Object that has a menu_item_info_id property

Returns

URL to item image as string
